t: Amazon.com: Frontier Co-op Organic Comfrey Root Powder, 16 Ounce : Health & Household
s: My local health food store discontinued comfrey root but this is less expensive and works the same as whatever brand they had (probably the same one.) I wish this was more mainstream because just about everyone can benefit from it. The clumping seems to be a positive thing for me.
